mapper.select: select tuser.id as id, tuser.user_name as userName, tuser.password as password, tuser.name as name, tuser.age as age, tuser.sex as sex, tuser.birthday as birthday, tuser.created as created, tuser.updated as updated from tb_user tuser where tuser.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user( id, user_name, password, name, age, sex, birthday)values( #{id}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{birthday} );
